column1: '''''The Iron Prison''''' is a text-adventure game designed by [[Sam Ruby]],<ref>[http://ifdb.tads.org/viewgame?id=43bmxdelqf6ayv7s The Interactive Fiction Database] (retrieved 27 OCtober 2010)</ref> in which the player needs to infiltrate [[Angband]], and find and bring back the [[Silmarils
column2: Silmaril]].<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/ironprison.html Tolkien Games] (retrieved 27 October 2010)</ref> You can kill [[Ancalagon]], [[Gothmog (balrog)
